trans-unit.source: The Azure Billing APIs provide access to resource consumption and metadata information for Azure subscriptions, providing the ability to better predict and manage Azure costs.
trans-unit.target: The Azure Billing APIs provide access to resource consumption and metadata information for Azure subscriptions, providing the ability to better predict and manage Azure costs.

trans-unit.source: For a conceptual overview of these APIs, including feature highlights and possible usage scenarios, see the <externalLink><linkText>Azure Billing Usage and RateCard APIs</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/billing-usage-rate-card-overview/</linkUri></externalLink> overview.
trans-unit.target: For a conceptual overview of these APIs, including feature highlights and possible usage scenarios, see the <externalLink><linkText>Azure Billing Usage and RateCard APIs</linkText><linkUri>http://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/articles/billing-usage-rate-card-overview/</linkUri></externalLink> overview.

trans-unit.source: All task operations conform to the HTTP/1.1 protocol specification and each operation returns an x-ms-request-id header that can be used to obtain information about the request.
trans-unit.target: All task operations conform to the HTTP/1.1 protocol specification and each operation returns an x-ms-request-id header that can be used to obtain information about the request.

trans-unit.source: You must also make sure that requests made to these resources are secure.
trans-unit.target: You must also make sure that requests made to these resources are secure.

trans-unit.source: This typically includes using an encrypted channel over SSL/HTTPS, and using Azure Active Directory for authentication.
trans-unit.target: This typically includes using an encrypted channel over SSL/HTTPS, and using Azure Active Directory for authentication.

trans-unit.source: Please also make sure that the calling user or the service principal is a member of the Owner, Contributor or Reader role in the Azure AD tenant for the requested subscription.
trans-unit.target: Please also make sure that the calling user or the service principal is a member of the Owner, Contributor or Reader role in the Azure AD tenant for the requested subscription.

trans-unit.source: For more information on authentication, see <link xlink:href="a1caa0f7-3250-46ed-95b5-8603d902383b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Azure Resource Manager requests</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information on authentication, see <link xlink:href="a1caa0f7-3250-46ed-95b5-8603d902383b" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Azure Resource Manager requests</link>.

trans-unit.source: More specifically, these APIs allow you to query Billing data at the Azure subscription level for the following categories:
trans-unit.target: More specifically, these APIs allow you to query Billing data at the Azure subscription level for the following categories:
